predicate.note: Frames file for 'divert' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. No comparison.

example.name: agent, but no source
example.text: Company lawyers recently sent letters to growers saying that Michael ``would take very seriously any effort ... *trace* to divert its contracted-for potatoes to other outlets.''

example.name: no agent, source and destination
example.text: With the increase, even more developing-country energy and talent would be diverted *trace* from creating profitable economic systems to setting up economic planning ministries that generate IMF-approved economic plans.
example.arg: *trace* -> even more developing-country energy and talent
setting up economic planning ministries that generate IMF-approved economic plans
